name: Time Story
description:
There's time travel involved in the story. Everything is connected.

Don't leave your focus away from the story, else you wouldn't understand what's going on. 

Do play the full game and don't miss the ending. It's amazing.

CONTROLS

A/D  - Left/Right

SPACE - Jump

K - Sword Swoosh/Slice

Enjoy the game. 

SPOILER ALERT

There is a time loop going on in this game. Blue cube is the future and Pink cube is the present. The comic-stories till the Revelation Episode  goes first and then comes the gameplay. After gameplay the last comic story takes place. 

Did you get the plot of the game?
